title: CMR Surgical receives FDA clearance for Versius Plus surgical robot
description:
The FDA previously granted marketing authorization for CMR’s first-generation Versius Surgical System in October 2024.

The post CMR Surgical receives FDA clearance for Versius Plus surgical robot appeared first on The Robot Report.
